issue.title: introduces CtModel for #584

repository.name: spoon
repository.description: Spoon is a metaprogramming library to analyze and transform Java source code. :spoon: is made with :heart:, :beers: and :sparkles:. It parses source files to build a well-designed AST with powerful analysis and transformation API.

issue.title: Release Spoon 5.2.0

repository.name: spoon
repository.description: Spoon is a metaprogramming library to analyze and transform Java source code. :spoon: is made with :heart:, :beers: and :sparkles:. It parses source files to build a well-designed AST with powerful analysis and transformation API.

issue.body:
We'll release the version Spoon 5.2.0 Wednesday, June 28.

Think to test the snapshot version to detect any bug or regression between the version 5.1.1 and the new one 5.2.0.

[Changelog here](https://github.com/INRIA/spoon/issues/725#issuecomment-228414886). Thanks to @tdurieux
